code:
%%{CloudNative_HelmChart}}}%%
flowchart TB
    subgraph Client [CloudNative_HelmChart]
        Browser[CloudNative_Serverless]
        MobileApp[CloudNative_K8sCluster]
        Echo[CloudNative_HelmChart]
    end

    subgraph WebSocket [CloudNative_HelmChart]
        Reverb[CloudNative_DockerImage]
        Channels[CloudNative_HelmChart]
        
        subgraph ChannelTypes [CloudNative_K8sCluster]
            Private[CloudNative_Serverless]
            Presence[CloudNative_Serverless]
            Public[CloudNative_K8sCluster]
        end
    end

    subgraph Application [CloudNative_HelmChart]
        subgraph EventSourcing [CloudNative_DockerImage]
            Aggregates[CloudNative_HelmChart]
            Events[CloudNative_HelmChart]
            Reactors[CloudNative_DockerImage]
        end
        
        subgraph Broadcasting [CloudNative_K8sCluster]
            BroadcastEvents[CloudNative_K8sCluster]
            Queue[CloudNative_Serverless]
        end
        
        subgraph Models [CloudNative_K8sCluster]
            Comment[CloudNative_HelmChart]
            Message[CloudNative_DockerImage]
            Todo[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
        end
    end

    subgraph Infrastructure [CloudNative_K8sCluster]
        Redis[CloudNative_HelmChart]
        EventStore[CloudNative_K8sCluster]
        Database[CloudNative_Serverless]
    end
    
    %% Client connections
    Browser --> Echo
    MobileApp --> Echo
    Echo --> Reverb
    
    %% WebSocket connections
    Reverb --> Channels
    Channels --> ChannelTypes
    
    %% Event flow
    Aggregates --> Events
    Events --> Reactors
    Events --> EventStore
    
    %% Reactor actions
    Reactors --> BroadcastEvents
    Reactors --> Models
    
    %% Broadcasting flow
    BroadcastEvents --> Queue
    Queue --> Redis
    
    %% WebSocket server connections
    Redis --> Reverb
    
    %% Model persistence
    Models --> Database
    
    %% Channel examples
    Private --> |"commentable.Post.{CloudNative_Serverless}"| Comment
    Private --> |"todo.{CloudNative_HelmChart}"| Todo
    Presence --> |"conversation.{CloudNative_ServiceMesh}"| Message
    
    %% Add notes
    classDef note fill:#fff,stroke:#999,stroke-width:1px,color:#333
    
    class Client,WebSocket,Application,Infrastructure,EventSourcing,Broadcasting,Models,ChannelTypes note
    
    %% Add styling
    classDef clientLayer fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#81d4fa,stroke-width:2px
    classDef wsLayer fill:#e8f5e9,stroke:#a5d6a7,stroke-width:2px
    classDef appLayer fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#ffe0b2,stroke-width:2px
    classDef infraLayer fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#e1bee7,stroke-width:2px
    
    class Client clientLayer
    class WebSocket,Reverb,Channels,ChannelTypes,Private,Presence,Public wsLayer
    class Application,EventSourcing,Broadcasting,Models,Aggregates,Events,Reactors,BroadcastEvents,Queue,Comment,Message,Todo appLayer
    class Infrastructure,Redis,EventStore,Database infraLayer
repo_description: Free and Open Source ERP platform
